messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Our mission is to implement our
operations without question.It is all for the new world order
that our boss will lead!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I’m willing to do anything to get ahead
in Team Galactic.One day you’ll see what we are all
about.It’s wonder, compassion, splendor,
humor, power, awe, and tragedy!
